alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gadsden, eastern Leon, southeastern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quincy, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Gretna, Lake Bradford, Douglas City, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Walker Ford Community Center, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, South City, Griffin Heights and Laingkat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
